"Liu Lin": "It appears you were able to find it. Those Ryuker Devices are a type of teleporter."
"When you approach one of the many such devices around Halpha, it will automatically register your personal data so you can use it."
"They have been around since most people can remember, yet nobody knows the details of how they work."
"To record your personal data at one, simply walk up to it and it will do so automatically."
"To help you find Ryuker Devices and Cocoons, your Mag is equipped with an ability called \"Active Sonar\"."
"Just now, I sent another set of coordinates to you. Please head towards that next Ryuker Device."
"When a Ryuker Device or Cocoon is nearby, your Mag's Active Sonar will activate and point you in its general direction."
"Using your Mag's Active Sonar, please head towards the corresponding Cocoon."
